recipe.title: Celebration Fizz
instructions: Freeze the grapes ahead of time. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Pour the vodka and grape juice over the ice and shake well. Place the frozen grapes in a Champagne flute and strain in the vodka and grape juice. Top with Champagne.
